CustomField.description: Legacy RIMS Account ID associated to the industrial account in IA and Salesforce. Not all accounts have a RIMS ID. This was intended for the Data Migration. Since manual entry was used, RIMS ID did not pass in the integration from IA to SF. Type: IA Integrated: Y
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the RIMS ID associated to this account.
CustomField.label: RIMS ID
